experiences.description: Britta Joy Peterson's Exquisite Frame is a digital performance series intended to directly engage ‚Äòearly-mid‚Äô career movement artists within the DC-Maryland-Virginia region. Exquisite Frame is a forum for experimentation, exposure, and exchange.

experiences.title: Co Producer - "A Model for Staying With"
experiences.description: Britta Joy Peterson's "A Model for Staying With‚Äù is a multidisciplinary art project broaching climate breakdown, ecological theory, and environmental communication. Skating the edge of personification and actualization, four people from a future-past dance a score for staying with that involves natural history, popular science, memory, loss and communication. They are projected simultaneously alone yet together, each with their own role and voice within the disconnected network. They carry on and continue, offline from one another.
experiences.location: Washington, District of Columbia, United States

experiences.title: Co Producer - "already there"
experiences.description: Britta Joy Peterson's "already there" is an immersive installation designed to be savored in small, timed-entry groups where patrons and digital viewers, like you, are invited to explore, indulge, and play in a sensory labyrinth of dance and design.
experiences.location: The John F. Kennedy Center for Performing Arts

experiences.title: Co Producer - "And Now, Hold Me"
experiences.description: Britta Joy Peterson's ‚ÄúAnd Now, Hold Me‚Äù offers up kaleidoscopic approaches to holding space via prismatic performance. This unflinchingly tender and unfailingly tenacious duet teases apart the relationship between self and space by using performance as means to couple the living in‚Äîand holding of‚Äîfleshy bodies and social spheres.

recommendations:
Eitan M.



Olivia and I worked together on the demand generation team at AWS. I was constantly impressed by her attention to detail and collaborative nature. She helped me achieve my first cloud certification and supplied invaluable advice during complex customer scenarios. Her methodical approach to problem-solving and passion for helping others make her a highly valued member of any team she joins. Olivia is a rockstar colleague.
